text:
make check fails with:
make[2]: *** No rule to make target `../libaprutil1.la', needed by `dbd'.  Stop.
make[2]: Leaving directory `/data/prj/apr/apr-util-1.4.x/test'

editing test/Makefile fixes the issue

old:
LOCAL_LIBS = ../libaprutil1.la


fixed:
LOCAL_LIBS = ../libaprutil.la

For some reason configure is adding a '1' (one) to the local_lib name.

Note:
../libaprutil.la is made by make

Note: same error for both apr-util-1.4.x and apr-util-1.5.x
creator: mamfelt@gmail.com
